name: Young Realist
text: This was a pickup order. Pizza looked like it needed more time in the oven.  Towards the center there was a bit of liquid that made me question how long it cooked. Almost reminded me of toasted bread with the toppings.  Not much flavor. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jay Allen
text: Friendly staff, good prices, good portions. Mostly clean and taking good covid precautions for being in Atlanta.

name: Charlyn Carr
text: Gluten free pizza just CAME UP! Made my special Spinach Pizza on Cauliflower crust and wow. THEE BEST PIZZA. From the crust to every fresh ingredient on top DELICIOUS. We will definitely be back.

name: Tanesha Shirley
text: I love this pizza place! Not only do they have a stone oven to cook your pizza in, but they also have keto and vegan options. I always get the take two which is a pizza and salad. They have this really cool lemonade that is divine! I go to this place pizza at least two or three times a month for lunch and it never disappoints!

name: Jermain R
text: Pizza was delicious..I have craving a spot where I can go and make a personal pan sized pizza and I think this is it!!....as many toppings that you want without the extra charge to fit on you personal box sized pizzaüçï!! Oh yeah! ‚Ä¶More

name: Blessed Beast
text: When they said fast-fired they meant it! Barely paid for my food and sat down before by pizza was ready. 'Za was piping hot and the ingredients were extra fresh. Would recommend coming with the family for a good bite.

name: jaideep sidhu
text: We have been to this location a few times and had a good experience. Their service is fast and we like their collection of toppings. I also really like their spicy tomato sauce which isn't that common elsewhere. ‚Ä¶More

text: Cool atmosphere, friendly staff, and good pizza.

name: Elizabeth Oliver
text: Jasper and team are fantastic. They allowed a last minute adjustment for my team this afternoon and accommodated us with grace and kindness. We really appreciate their staff making our order painless. The pizza is also perfect. I love the customization options, endless topping selections, and choices for all kinds of dietary needs!

name: Joon Kim
text: These days observations: Lots of people doing take-out order. Some people sit in and eat. Usually they are one who wears no masks even when store requires them to. If you dont want to interact with them or dont feel comfortable, dont go. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam J

text: Good value ATL pizza chain. This location just opened in the fall of 2018. Interesting, yet good signature pizzas, along with draft beer and wine. name: Joshua Wilburn

text: I ordered two pizzas for pick up, but when I started to leave my car was dead. Not sure but wanted to leave a review to hopefully get my money back somehow .

name: Chris Doane
text: The pizza was burnt on the edge and undercooked in center. First disappointed visit. Usually they are excellent.

text: First off, great pizza. Charred perfectly, thin crust and great taste. Customer service was great here, too. The employees were super friendly. name: Mike Weaver
text: First time visit and the pizza was outstanding! Flavorful crust, not too thick. The service was great and accommodating to orders. Would definitely visit again and highly recommend. A nice flow of customers arrived during the hour sit down visit.

name: Michael Hamilton
